text: Downhill Racer is a 1969 American sports drama movie directed by first time director Michael Ritchie and was based on the 1963 novel by Oakley Hall. It stars Robert Redford, Gene Hackman, Camilla Sparv, Karl Michael Vogler, Jim McMullan, Kathleen Crowley, Dabney Coleman, Sylvester Stallone and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1969 drama movies Category:1960s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Movies set in Austria Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies set in the Alps
title: Downhill Racer
